"Rare Rappy Species":
"I'm Gerard, a civilian biologist researching
the various fauna of nearby planets, but
the ARKS research facilities do not grant
me enough freedom. I intend to write a
report, so I need to ask for some...
power, if you will. My target is the rare
species called Rappies. There have been
many sightings, but nothing is known
about their ecology. How interesting...
